name: retrospectai-obsidian-plugin
description: AI-powered retrospective analysis plugin for Obsidian that analyzes your notes to provide insights on productivity patterns and personal growth

scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && cp main.js manifest.json .obsidian-test/.obsidian/plugins/retrospectai/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
